helen.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • helen.shapes.Shape
      • helen.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    This class models a Processing-drawable Rectangle.
    Version:
    9.20.17
    Author:
    Helen Wang

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates new instance of Rectangle object that
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - Pixel width
        height - Pixel height
        Postcondition:
        boolean isGrey is true

      • changeColour

        public void changeColour(boolean isGrey)
        Will fill the rectangle in either w random gray shade or with a colour
        Specified by:
        changeColour in class Shape
        Parameters:
        isGrey - boolean of whether or not the shape should be filled in greyscale or with rbg colour
        Postcondition:
        the shape will be filled in w/ a colour, boolean isGrey will be set to the argument, and fields r, g, b, will be changed

      • setColour

        public void setColour(int colour)
        sets the colour of the rect, called in draw
        Parameters:
        colour - int greyscale value
        Precondition:
        draw will only draw w/ this grey colour if isGrey == true
        Postcondition:
        changes value of g
